body.raw:
{
    "os": "Windows or Linux",
    "processor": "Intel Core i5 10400",
    "ramGb": 12,
    "videoCard": "NVIDIA GTX 1650 Super",
    "storageGb": 30
}

item.name: Add a Game with no DevelopmentCompany Id

exec: pm.expect(data.message).to.eql("The game needs a development company to be created");

item.name: Add a Game with invalid DevelopmentCompany Copy

exec: pm.expect(data.message).to.eql("The development company with the given id was not found");

item.name: Add a Game with no MinimumSpec Id

exec: pm.expect(data.message).to.eql("The game needs minimum requirements to be created");

item.name: Add a Game with invalid MinimumSpec

exec: pm.expect(data.message).to.eql("The minimum requirements with the given id was not found");
pm.expect(data.message).to.eql("The game with the given id was not found");
pm.expect(data.message).to.eql("The game with the given id was not found");
pm.expect(data.message).to.eql("The game with the given id was not found");
